title: Understanding Airport Runway Foreign Object Debris Detection Systems [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Computer Vision and Deep Learning Concepts, General Knowledge of Airport Operations Processes
context.additional_context: Modular 15-minute learning units based on mobile devices, including real-time quizzes and simulation activities

learning_goals: Learners can describe three or more types and risks of foreign object debris (FOD) occurring on airport runways
Learners can explain the principles of applying deep learning-based image recognition systems to foreign object detection and tracking
Learners can perform foreign object detection processes with 80% accuracy using simulation tools that replicate real airport environments

resources: Airport Runway FOD (Foreign Object Debris) Dataset Sample

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
